metadata.title: CVE-2024-24853 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Incorrect behavior order in transition between executive monitor and SMItransfer monitor (STM) in some Intel(R) Processor may allow a privilegeduser to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-24853` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20240813.0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20240813.0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm2').
